name: RES_RPT_COMP_RTF_CMT_PTR
description: This table contains a list of lines which hold multi-line rich text user comments for a repeat component on the result from the RSLT_RTF_CMT_STG table.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the result record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the repeat of a component on the result from the RES_REPEAT_COMPONENT table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple rich text comments for the repeat of a component on the result from the RSLT_RTF_CMT_STG table.

columns.name: RICH_TEXT_GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of a specific line of rich text comment for the repeat of a component on the result from the RSLT_RTF_CMT_STG table.
